param.name: listids
param.label: List IDs
param.description: THIS IS A REQUIRED FIELD. Enter the id number of the lists you wish to allow users to subscribe to seperated by a comma , . If only one is entered there will not be an option displayed but they will automatically be subscribed to this list

param.name: red_url
param.label: Redirect URL
param.description: The URL that you want the user to be redirected after they have been subscribed, if not specified it will redirect automatically to the user subscription form.

param.name: linear
param.label: Show module in line
param.description: Select whether or not to show the information in a line or with a vertical presentation.

param.name: introtext
param.label: Introduction text
param.description: The text that appears in the introduction. LEAVE BLANK TO NOT SHOW NOTHING. Use pretext for CSS layout.

param.name: showlistname
param.label: Show List Name
param.description: Select whether or not to show the name of the list after the introduction.

param.name: defaultchecked
param.label: Check list by default
param.description: Select whether or not to you want the check box for each list checked by default.

param.name: shownamefield
param.label: Show Name Field
param.description: select whether or not to show the name field.

param.name: fieldsize
param.label: Field size
param.description: Enter the ammount of characters for the name and e-mail form fields.

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed at the bottom of the subscription form. LEAVE BLANK TO NOT SHOW ANYTHING. Use postext for CSS layout.

param.name: receivehtmldefault
param.label: Default Receive HTML
param.description: Set this option to show the default html mailing configuration. If the Show Receive HTML is set to No then this option will be the default.

param.name: showreceivehtml
param.label: Show Receive HTML
param.description: Set to Yes to allow users to decide whether they want HTML or not. Set to No to use default receive html.

param.name: button_text
param.label: Button Unregistered Text
param.description: The text that appears on subcribe button, when people are not subcribed yet, if left blank it will load _ACA_MOD_SUBSCRIBE from your language file

param.name: button_img
param.label: Button Unregistered Image
param.description: An image that you want to use for the subcribe button, when people are not subcribed yet, if left blank the button name will be used. If your images is on the site you can specify only the path images/tick.png otherwise specify the full url to your image.

param.name: button_text_change
param.label: Button Registered Text
param.description: The text that appears on subcribe button, when people are logged in, if left blank it will load _ACA_CHANGE_SUBSCRIPTIONS from your language file

param.name: button_img_change
param.label: Button Registered Image
param.description: An image that you want to use for the subcribe button, when people are logged in, if left blank the button name will be used. If your images is on the site you can specify only the path images/tick.png otherwise specify the full url to your image.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Enter the class suffix you would like to use so you can define custom CSS styling.

param.name: mod_align
param.label: Module alignement
param.description: display alignement of the module. If left blank , it will use default CSS.

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
